programme.desc: 《中國深度財經》: 節目以上海為據點, 全面、深入探討中國內地經濟發展狀況, 從而讓世界更準確地了解中國、了解上海。

programme.desc: 《鳳凰焦點新聞》: 聚焦重大時政議題, 重大社會事件和新聞熱點, 原創性挖掘更多時事與背景, 分析梳理新聞的前因後果, 人物命運, 呈現權威觀點。

programme.title: 問答神州
programme.desc: 《問答神州》: 致力採訪兩岸四地的關鍵人物, 與政壇精英進行高端對話。觀眾將可第一時間掌握中國的最新變化和發展, 將眼光投向快速增長的中國經濟、改革轉型中的大時代。

programme.title: 時事直通車
programme.desc: 《時事直通車》: 節目專門網羅國際重大事件和其他集錦新聞、聚焦大陸、台灣及香港的要聞時事。

programme.title: 鳳凰正點播報 2200
programme.desc: 《鳳凰正點播報》: 每天全球各個角落、各個領域最有價值、新鮮熱辣的新聞大事, 《鳳凰正點播報》為你追蹤報導。第一時間為你送上, 第一時間讓你知道最新發展。

programme.title: 新聞今日談
programme.desc: 《新聞今日談》: 節目針對當天最熱門時事問題, 在觀眾最關注的時刻即時作出評論, 讓觀眾更洞悉事件的真相。

programme.title: 鳳凰正點播報 2300
programme.desc: 《鳳凰正點播報》: 每天全球各個角落、各個領域最有價值、新鮮熱辣的新聞大事, 《鳳凰正點播報》為你追蹤報導。第一時間為你送上, 第一時間讓你知道最新發展。

programme.title: 新聞鑒證組
programme.desc: 《新聞鑒證組》: 捕捉虛假新聞, 追溯資源源頭與發布者, 調查發布者的背景和可信度, 核查資訊內容與發布動機。破解新聞中不實的報導, 還原新聞事件真相。

programme.title: 鳳凰洲際快車
programme.desc: 《鳳凰洲際快車》是鳳凰衛視子夜時段的新聞資訊節目, 為您帶來兩岸三地, 以及國際社會的大小新聞、最新動態和局勢發展。

programme.title: 風雲對話
programme.desc: 《風雲對話》是一個高素質的訪談節目, 節目採訪全球“最關鍵、最前線、最敏感”權傾一時的掌權者, 他們影響並決定著整個國際局勢的變化和發展。一個個世界級人物在節目中, 親自向您剖析他們的觀點。

programme.title: 香港新視點
programme.desc: 《香港新視點》是透過訪問特區政府官員、學者、焦點事件的相關人物, 以及採訪兩地的年輕人的交流團等, 讓觀眾透徹了解香港以至內地政治文化, 加深對國情的認識。

programme.title: African Voices Changemakers: Cultural Guardians
programme.desc: Larry Madowo travels across Nigeria to meet two remarkable storytellers preserving the nation's heritage. In Enugu, heritage specialist Iheanyi Igboko safeguards Igbo traditions through the Centre for Memories, while in Lagos, historian Oludamola Adebowale uses digital innovation to archive and celebrate Nigeria's cultural past. Together, they reveal how history, language, and art continue to shap

programme.title: Connecting Africa: Food Security
programme.desc: Across the continent, food security is emerging as both a challenge and an opportunity. programme.title: Inside Africa: Saving Malawi's Mulanje Cedar
programme.desc: Rising dramatically from the plains of southern Malawi, Mount Mulanje is a soaring granite massif known as the "Island in the Sky." It is home to a fragile and unique ecosystem and at its heart stands the Mulanje cedar (Widdringtonia whytei), a tree so rare it's found nowhere else on Earth. programme.title: Bloomberg Markets: China Open
programme.desc: The definitive guide to the markets in Hong Kong and on the mainland. Rishaad Salamat, David Ingles, Tom Mackenzie and Yvonne Man bring you the latest analysis to get you ready for the trading day.

programme.title: Bloomberg Markets: Asia
programme.desc: From Hong Kong, the most important global business and breaking markets news information as it happens.

programme.title: Bloomberg Daybreak: Middle East
programme.desc: From Dubai, connecting Asian markets to the European opens - this show focuses on global macro issues with a Middle Eastern context.

programme.title: Bloomberg Daybreak: Europe
programme.desc: Live from London, we catch you up with overnight markets news from the US and Asia. Plus, we'll tell you what matters for investors in Europe, giving you insight before trading begins.

programme.title: Bloomberg Markets: Europe
programme.desc: Anchored by Anna Edwards and Mark Cudmore, a fast-paced show of news and analysis, building towards the drama and excitement of the start of trading across the Continent.

programme.title: Bloomberg Markets: European Open
programme.desc: Kick-start the trading day with Francine Lacqua and Tom Mackenzie from London bringing you news that no investor in Europe can afford to miss.

programme.title: Bloomberg Technology
programme.desc: The only daily live technology program with a focus on breaking news, market-moving reporting and analysis of global technology companies and stories.

programme.title: Bloomberg Surveillance: Early Edition
programme.desc: With Anna Edwards, Matt Miller, and Kailey Leinz from London, Berlin and New York, bringing insight on markets and the top stories of the day.

programme.title: Bloomberg Surveillance
programme.desc: Daily conversations with leaders and decision makers from Wall Street to Washington and beyond. Hosted by Jonathan Ferro, Lisa Abramowicz and Annmarie Hordern.

programme.desc: From New York, the most important global business and breaking markets news and information as it happens.

programme.desc: Bloomberg Balance of Power focuses on politics and policies on Capitol Hill, in President Trump's administration, the federal agencies and the courts.
